ARABIC: أَوْ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٌ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَعِنَبٍ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلْأَنْهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفْجِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or have a garden of dates and grapes which you make rivers come pouring through;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or, until you acquire an orchard of date-palm trees and grapes, and produce rivers flowing through it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or that there be a garden of palms and vines for you and then you cause rivers to abundantly flow forth through them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or you (show) us that you have your own garden of palm trees and vines with flowing streams therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Or you have a garden of date-palms and grapes, and you make gushing rivers to flow in it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or you have a garden of date palms and grapes, and cause rivers to gush forth in their midst abundantly;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or you should have a garden of palms and grapes in the midst of which you should cause rivers to flow forth, gushing out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or till thou possessest a garden of plants and vines, and thou makest rivers to gush forth abundantly all amongst it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or thou have a garden of date-palms and grapes, and cause rivers to gush forth therein abundantly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: or you have a garden of date palms and vines, and cause streams to flow plentifully in the midst of them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or there be for thee a garden of date-palms and wine, and thou causest in the midst thereof rivers to gush forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Or until you have a garden of date palms and vines and you make streams gush through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or (until) thou have a garden of date trees and vines, and cause rivers to gush forth in their midst, carrying abundant water;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or you have a garden of date-palms and grapes, and cause rivers to gush forth in their midst abundantly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: or, until you own a garden of palms and vines and cause rivers to gush forth with abundant water in them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or you have a garden of palms and vines; then cause rivers to gush pouring through them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:91] or until you [come to] have a garden, an orchard, of date-palms and vines, and cause streams to gush forth therein, in the midst of these, abundantly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or thou have a garden of date-palms and grapes, and cause rivers to gush forth therein) i.e. in their middle (abundantly);
